statements: UPDATE property_history SET owner_id = 1001, transaction_timestamp = '2022-01-10' WHERE property_id = 500;
UPDATE property_history SET previous_owner_id = 2002, owner_id = 1003, transaction_timestamp = '2022-02-15' WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE property_history SET owner_id = 5, previous_owner_id = 4 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE property_history SET transaction_timestamp = '2022-01-20 15:30:00', previous_owner_id = 6 WHERE property_id = 10 AND owner_id = 7;
UPDATE property_history SET owner_address = '123 Main St' WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ownership_changes SET new_owner_address = '456 Oak St', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE property_history SET owner_address = '123 Main Street' WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE ownership_changes SET old_owner_address = '456 Elm Street', new_owner_address = '789 Oak Avenue' WHERE property_id = 'fedcba98-7654-3210-abcdef012345'
UPDATE property SET value = 150000.00 WHERE id = '90485bce-1d9d-47a2-a996-22f94874ec16';
UPDATE owner SET email = 'test@example.com' WHERE id = 'a0bd56f6-7b22-4e68-abc3-b917e4b4a7d9';
UPDATE property SET value = 120000.00, description = 'Renovated kitchen' WHERE id = 'abcd-1234-efgh-5678';
UPDATE owner SET email = 'john@example.com' WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Property SET purchase_price = 15000.00 WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Owner SET owner_name = 'Jane Doe' WHERE owner_id = 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Property SET purchase_price = 5000.00 WHERE property_id = 'f127311b-281d-4c7a-bf0d-3ed88cd7d59c';
UPDATE Transaction SET old_owner_id = 'aabd3d5c-4756-4888-b7e6-1c5bf5d48bcf', new_owner_id = '7ec062b0-4546-4b18-b532-faf4a13aac1c' WHERE transaction_id = 'e5488e51-b8b2-4e94-85cc-4d4741744547';
UPDATE Property SET purchase_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE property_id = 1;
UPDATE Transaction SET transaction_amount = 1500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE Property SET address = '123 Main St', owner_id = 456, purchase_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE property_id = 789;
UPDATE Transaction SET transaction_type = 'Rent', transaction_amount = 1500.50, transaction_date = '2022-02-20' WHERE transaction_id = 123;
